  and return the result as a string.
  If shift > number of digits, return digits reversed.
  >>> circularShift(12, 1)
  "21"
  >>> circularShift(12, 2)
  "12"
  */
const circularShift = (x, shift) => {
  let result = '';
  for (let i = 0; i < x.length; i++) {
    result += x[(x.length - 1) - i];
  }
  if (shift < x.length) {
    result = result.slice(shift);
  } else {
    result = result.slice(0, x.length - shift);
  }
  return result;
};
